title: STAT+: Trump administration indicates it will drop appeal of a court order blocking a 340B pilot program
description: The Trump administration has signaled plans to drop its appeal of a court order that blocked a pilot from changing payment terms for the 340B drug discount program.
content: The Trump administration has signaled plans to drop its appeal of a court order that blocked a pilot from changing payment terms for the 340B drug discount program.
